body_html:
Building PyTorch with CUDA 9.2 for 7.0 compute compatibility devices produces quite worrisome warnings:

warning : Instruction 'vote' without '.sync' may produce unpredictable results on sm_70 and later architectures
warning : Instruction 'vote' without '.sync' is deprecated since PTX ISA version 6.0 and will be discontinued in a future PTX ISA version

warning : Instruction 'shfl' without '.sync' is deprecated since PTX ISA version 6.0 and will be discontinued in a future PTX ISA version
warning : Instruction 'shfl' without '.sync' may produce unpredictable results on sm_70 and later architectures
body_text:
Building PyTorch with CUDA 9.2 for 7.0 compute compatibility devices produces quite worrisome warnings:
warning : Instruction 'vote' without '.sync' may produce unpredictable results on sm_70 and later architectures
warning : Instruction 'vote' without '.sync' is deprecated since PTX ISA version 6.0 and will be discontinued in a future PTX ISA version
warning : Instruction 'shfl' without '.sync' is deprecated since PTX ISA version 6.0 and will be discontinued in a future PTX ISA version
warning : Instruction 'shfl' without '.sync' may produce unpredictable results on sm_70 and later architectures
body:
Building PyTorch with CUDA 9.2 for 7.0 compute compatibility devices produces quite worrisome warnings:

warning : Instruction 'vote' without '.sync' may produce unpredictable results on sm_70 and later architectures
warning : Instruction 'vote' without '.sync' is deprecated since PTX ISA version 6.0 and will be discontinued in a future PTX ISA version

warning : Instruction 'shfl' without '.sync' is deprecated since PTX ISA version 6.0 and will be discontinued in a future PTX ISA version
warning : Instruction 'shfl' without '.sync' may produce unpredictable results on sm_70 and later architectures
